Package org.cesecore.roles.member

Interface RoleMemberSession

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    RoleMemberSessionLocal, RoleMemberSessionRemote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RoleMemberSessionBean
    public interface RoleMemberSession
    Session bean for managing role members, taking authorization of the authentication token into account.
    Version:
    $Id: RoleMemberSession.java 26255 2017-08-09 08:52:46Z oskareriksson $

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      RoleMember getRoleMember​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken, int roleMemberId)
      Returns the Role Member with the given ID, or null if it does not exist.
      List<RoleMember> getRoleMembersByRoleId​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken, int roleId)  
      RoleMember persist​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken, RoleMember roleMember)
      Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
      RoleMember persist​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken, RoleMember roleMember, boolean requireNonImportantRoleMembership)
      Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
      boolean remove​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken, int roleMemberId)
      Deletes the role member with the specified ID.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoleMember

        RoleMember getRoleMember​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                         int roleMemberId)
                  throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Returns the Role Member with the given ID, or null if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Token
        roleMemberId - ID
        Returns:
        member
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if not authorized to the Role or the CA in the RoleMember object.

      • persist

        RoleMember persist​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                   RoleMember roleMember)
            throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        roleMember - member
        Returns:
        The persisted version of the role member (and null if the provided roleMember was null)
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access was denied to editing this role member or the referenced CA or Role.

      • persist

        RoleMember persist​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                   RoleMember roleMember,
                   boolean requireNonImportantRoleMembership)
            throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Adds or updates a Role Member (use ID RoleMember.ROLE_MEMBER_ID_UNASSIGNED to assign when adding a RoleMember).
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        roleMember - member
        requireNonImportantRoleMembership - if true, this method will check that the admin does not decrease its own access by adding/modifying this role
        Returns:
        The persisted version of the role member (and null if the provided roleMember was null)
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - If access was denied to editing this role member or the referenced CA or Role.

      • remove

        boolean remove​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
               int roleMemberId)
        throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Deletes the role member with the specified ID.
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - token
        roleMemberId - Member ID
        Returns:
        true if successfully deleted, false if it did not exist.
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if access denied

      • getRoleMembersByRoleId

        List<RoleMember> getRoleMembersByRoleId​(AuthenticationToken authenticationToken,
                                        int roleId)
                                 throws AuthorizationDeniedException
        Parameters:
        authenticationToken - Token
        roleId - Role ID
        Returns:
        a list of RoleMembers that belongs to the specified Role
        Throws:
        AuthorizationDeniedException - if the caller is not authorized to the role (including any of the RoleMember's tokenIssuerIds)
